## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy)
The first light breaks the horizon. A golden haze fills the room.
This 3-hour LoFi + Synthwave sunrise mix is designed to set a calm, focused tone for the start of your day. Inspired by early morning light, warm analog textures, and gentle momentum, Lucid Origin supports studying, creative work, and slow, intentional productivity.
Royalty-free and safe for content creators.
Best For
- Morning study and homework sessions
- Starting the workday or coding with focus
- Gentle wake-up routines and mood elevation
Aesthetic
Golden hour light • soft haze • analog warmth • clean synth textures
## 4. VISUAL DESIGN (Image + Animation Notes)
### Image Prompt — Lucid Origin Sunrise Desk
Cinematic desk setup at early sunrise, warm golden light entering through a window, subtle lens flare across the room, clean synthwave-inspired aesthetic, soft orange and gold palette, minimal clutter, calm atmosphere, gentle reflections, no harsh contrast, no rain.
### Animation Notes
- Very subtle light pulse in golden tones
- Soft dust motes drifting through sunlight
- No camera movement or zoom
- No exaggerated glow or flare effects

## 7. BRAND NOTES
- Sunrise mixes should remain clean, warm, and uncluttered.
- Avoid heavy neon, rain, or nighttime cues.
- This theme complements—but should not replace—your core night / CRT identity.
